title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction: Ergonomic principles and fundamentals. Man machine systems. Anthropometry: Physiological requirements. Engineering anthropometry. Ergonomic Design: Performance and energy cost of different modes and postures of operation of handles, levers, knobs, gadgets, etc. Ergonomic design of system, equipment, devices and tools. Work Environment: Workplace design and layout of working environment. Vibration and Noise: Effect of machine vibration, noise, thermal stresses on overall system performance. Standardization and Safety: Ergonomic standardization and assessment of product quality, measures for operator safety and comfort.
